entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: v0.22.2 Split pages fixes
entry.content:
A quick fix to page selection for various operations

What's Changed

  • Number fxes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/898

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.22.1...v0.22.2

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: v0.22.3 Pipeline out of alpha
entry.content:
Security

  • Usernames now must not contain special characters
  • Various dependency bumps

Enhancements

  • Pipeline moved to beta from alpha! Still will have bugs, lets see..
  • Pipeline can now save pipeline config to browser (And you can save browser to account)
  • Better logging for CLI apps since people dont check docker logs! #885
  • Better memory usage of certain PDFBox operations

Bug fixes

  • Auto-rename had white spaces at end, now resolved #901
  • When running in a secured environment dockerFile will now default to container user when unable to create custom user
  • Compress PDF fixes

What's Changed

  • chore: fix some typos by @pavedroad in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/900
  • Number of fixes and making pipline LIVE ! by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/907
  • Enforcing Username Uniqueness by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/906
  • dep bumps and nonroot bypass by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/910
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @listiges-kaenguru in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/903
  • ðŸ”¨ add Developer tools/scripts by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/828
  • Update licenses-update.yml by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/911
  • Update build.gradle by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/912
  • Frooodle patch 2 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/913
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/914
  • Bump com.google.zxing:core from 3.5.2 to 3.5.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/779
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/919
  • Fix typo in example yaml file by @tongkl1 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/922
  • lang, save to browser by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/923

New Contributors

  • @pavedroad made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/900
  • @listiges-kaenguru made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/903
  • @github-actions made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/914
  • @tongkl1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/922

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.22.2...v0.22.3

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.22.4 Various dependency updates and fixes
entry.content:
• Fixed an error that occurred after logging out and selecting another language. (Thanks @Ludy87)
  • Made changes to characters in multiple languages for Unicode compatibility. (Thanks @Ludy87)
  • Updated Italian language message properties. (Thanks @albanobattistella)
  • Dependency version updates across various libraries including Apache PDFBox, Spring Framework, Micrometer, and others. (PDFBox is important update, bug fixes etc)
  • Transitioned to HTML5. (Thanks @Ludy87)

What's Changed

  • Fix: Error after logging out and selecting another language by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/924
  • changes characters in multiple languages - Unicode ascii by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/925
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/927
  • Bump org.apache.pdfbox:xmpbox from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/933
  • Bump org.springframework:spring-webmvc from 6.1.4 to 6.1.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/934
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.12.3 to 1.12.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/930
  • Bump com.github.jk1.dependency-license-report from 2.5 to 2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/932
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-web from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/948
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-devtools from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/949
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-actuator from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/950
  • Bump io.github.pixee:java-security-toolkit from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/946
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/952
  • Change to html5 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/958
  • Bump org.commonmark:commonmark from 0.21.0 to 0.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/957
  • Bump org.projectlombok:lombok from 1.18.28 to 1.18.32 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/955
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-data-jpa from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/953
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-security from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/956
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-thymeleaf from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/954
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/960
  • Bump org.springdoc:springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui from 2.2.0 to 2.4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/964
  • Bump org.springframework.boot from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/962
  • Bump org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter-test from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/961
  • Bump org.apache.pdfbox:pdfbox from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/963
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/965
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/966

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.22.3...v0.22.4

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.22.5 Chinese lang updates, bug fixes
entry.content:
Language updates and various bug fixes!

What's Changed

  • dummy commit by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/968
  • Update messages_es_ES.properties by @NeilJared in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/969
  • Update messages_ja_JP.properties by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/975
  • Update TextFinder.java by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/980
  • feat: Extract translation text from html and finished the mainly translation of zh_CN, zh_TW, ja_JP file by @cocomastergo in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/987
  • fix: Fix package name of openjdk for debian by @NicolasFR in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/990
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/991
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/992
  • Define a constant for a literal string that is duplicated n times (Sonar) by @pixeebot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/978
  • fix: Add MultiTool UploadPrompts zh_CN And en_US by @spfantop in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/977

New Contributors

  • @cocomastergo made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/987
  • @spfantop made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/977

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.22.4...v0.22.5
